properties.name: context
properties.label: CLI Context
properties.description: Provide the name of the management context to connect to.

properties.name: selector
properties.label: Selector
properties.description: Provide an optional JMS message selector (SQL where condition, reference the properties in the message).

properties.name: include
properties.label: Include Property Names
properties.description: Provide a blank separated list of property names that needs to be included in each message, even if there value don't change.

properties.name: add
properties.label: Handle Add Events
properties.description: Enable it if you want that add events should be handled.

properties.name: change
properties.label: Handle Change Events
properties.description: Enable it if you want that change events should be handled.

properties.name: remove
properties.label: Handle Remove Events
properties.description: Enable it if you want that remove events should be handled.
